item.title: Very loose manhole cover causing severe noise and damage, 25th February
item.description:
A manhole cover on the A435 very near houses in Cherry Blossom Close and Bramble Chase is loose and is causing very high volume metallic noise when every time any vehicle passes over it, 24/7 and it's causing unaccapetable high noise volume to surrounding houses

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A435, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Children playing sign needed, 25th February
item.description:
This is a cul de sac with lots of families with young children that are crossing over and playing at the end of the road. Lots of cars and delivery vans use the road as a turning place and come around the corner at the top very fast. It would be useful to have a children playing sign to encourage them to slow down as they enter the cul de sac.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 13 Cotswold Lodge Pittville Circus Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Really bad pot holes, 25th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Water Reclamation Works Frog Furlong Lane, Down Hatherley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes on both elmfield road and elmfield avenue, 24th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Saint Mary's Mews, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose drain cover again!, 24th February
item.description:
The drain was 'fixed' less than 4 weeks ago by digging up the old drain and replacing the whole drain filling in badly with tarmac around the drain so no doubt that will need fixing soon. It started banging again about 2 weeks after it was replaced. If you could please return and fix/ add a seal to dampen /secure the cover before this time next year, I would be very grateful...
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3 The Maples The Reddings, The Reddings
Report on FixMyStreet
